characters.story: "NWOH?" the fingers question curiously - should we transfer the prisoner from Alcatraz?
"WOO!" the lawyer's words sing cheerfully though he'd charge falsely to win the case!
"YOO!" they command sharply when offering words of praise for his reputation!
The mountain bends down drooping to form a small islet in the bay.
The person bends down drooping over the farmer's almanac with animal legs - he's too thick-headed to understand!
"JWAN!" the mason sings cheerfully, laying each brick in the stone wall!
"HWAY!" my heart commands sharply - will you do me a favor?
"SWAY!" the wild rice commands sharply, each ear of grain swaying in the favor of wind!
"KWAHNG!" the sun commands sharply over the expansive internet of wilderness!
"KWAHNG!" the stone commands sharply when they discover the mine shaft!
"KWOH!" the fingers command sharply on the screen to enlarge the photo!
"TSUNG!" the ear sings cheerfully - listen and you'll be smart!
"TSUNG!" the flower sings cheerfully, following the GPS in my heart to find onions!
The flesh bends down drooping during surgery to remove the gall bladder.
"JAN!" the eyeballs sing cheerfully to the snitch - look upward at the stars!
The fingers bend down drooping like the flying Dutchman to cuddle the baby.
The flag bends down drooping like the flying Dutchman - time and again the villagers are harmed.
"JWOH?" the water questions curiously through the butterfly net - is it turbid or clear?
